channel.title: World
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from World, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: One dead and six missing as fishing boat out of historic Massachusetts port is lost at sea
item.description: Fate of the Lily Jean, out of Gloucester with crew of seven, remains unknown after empty life boat and debris field discovered There wasn’t a mayday c...

item.title: Snow and blizzards move into US east coast as 85 dead from last week’s storm
item.description: About 190,000 are still without power in the south-east as states scramble to prepare for more winter weather Dozens of people have died in the teeth ...

item.title: Epstein files latest: photos appear to show former prince Andrew crouching over female
item.description: Elon Musk and former UK ambassador to US Peter Mandelson among those named in newly released documents What have we learned from the newly released Ep...

item.title: Labour chooses Angeliki Stogia for Gorton and Denton byelection
item.description: Manchester city councillor selected to fight seat after closely fought contest and vote by local members The Labour party has selected its candidate t...

item.title: Andrew invited Epstein to Buckingham Palace after child sex offender’s release, files show
item.description: Emails between former prince and financier revealed in latest tranche of released documents • Epstein files – latest updates Andrew Mountbatten-Windso...

item.title: Student loan system 'fair and reasonable', says Reeves
item.description: The chancellor's defence comes after Martin Lewis called her freeze on student loans "not a moral thing".

item.title: Israeli air strikes kill at least 28 Palestinians in Gaza, rescue officials say
item.description: Israel's military confirmed the strikes, which come during a ceasefire that Israel and Hamas accuse each other of breaking.

item.title: Latest Epstein revelations dig even deeper hole for Andrew
item.description: More unedifying pictures and words mean it doesn't get any better for Andrew Mountbatten-Windsor.

item.title: Watch: Frozen river hosts dance party in Kyiv
item.description: Residents in the Ukrainian capital are finding joy in unusual places, despite power cuts caused by Russian attacks and freezing winter temperatures.

item.title: Forest agree Ortega deal and target Inter's Frattesi
item.description: Nottingham Forest agree a deal for Manchester City goalkeeper Stefan Ortega worth up to £500,000.
